mutants.original_line: has_capital = re.search(r'[A-Z]', password) is not None
mutants.code:
import re

def is_valid_password(password):
    has_capital = re.search('[A-Z]', password) is None
    has_lower = re.search('[a-z]', password) is not None
    has_digit = re.search('\\d', password) is not None
    has_special = re.search('\\W', password) is not None
    has_no_whitespace = re.search('\\s', password) is None
    return has_capital and has_lower and has_digit and has_special and has_no_whitespace

import re

def is_valid_password(password):
    has_capital = re.search('[A-Z]', password) is not None
    has_lower = re.search('[a-z]', password) is not None
    has_digit = re.search('\\d', password) is not None
    has_special = re.search('\\W', password) is not None
    has_no_whitespace = re.search('', password) is None
    return has_capital and has_lower and has_digit and has_special and has_no_whitespace
